channel.title: 562 How can i get the doors working?
channel.description:
Hi,
In my server game, when i click on the door it says the doors ID and location. How can i get the door to open and anyone please tell me? I can't find any tutorials. If there is can someone please tell me where to find it.

item.title: 562 How can i get the doors working?
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

Look at 317-377 bases. They work the exact same way.
